title: Livelihood Improvement for Enhancing Resilience in Host-Communities in Cox’s Bazar (Life)
mainFocus: Crop, agriculture, livestock, aquaculture, community mobilization, women empowerment

title: Locally Led Disaster Risk Reduction in the Bangladesh Coastal Region
mainFocus: Disaster risk reduction in the Bangladesh coastal region through a consortium named Sundarban Coalition

title: USAID Ecosystems/Protibesh Activity-CNRS
mainFocus: The goal of the USAID-funded Protibesh cooperative agreement aims to build the Government of Bangladesh’s capacity to respond to threats to biodiversity conservation in collaboration with civil society organizations and community stakeholders

title: Resilience Boat Resident Communities in Bangladesh
mainFocus: Reducing waterborne disease for boat-dwelling communities in Chandpur through installation of FWC and Women Leadership. Improving access to health/sanitation services for boat-dwelling people. Empowerment of Health/Sanitation and Disaster Preparedness

title: Access to Justice at Community
mainFocus: Establish dispute resolution/Restorative Justice mechanisms at the community level through RJ facilitators with support of community volunteers. Awareness raising on legal and social issues and information provision on required services in the community

title: Sustainable Forests & Livelihoods (SUFAL) Project
mainFocus: The overall objective of the project is to improve collaborative forest management and increase access to alternative income generation activities for forest-dependent communities in targeted sites

title: Gender Responsive Coastal Adaptation (GCA) Project
mainFocus: Enhancing adaptive capacities of coastal communities, especially women, to cope with climate change-induced salinity in Bangladesh

title: Improving Peaceful Coexistence and Livelihoods in Rohingya Hosting Areas in Bangladesh
mainFocus: Livelihood enhancement of host communities living around 7 refugee camps in Teknaf Upazila as well as supporting refugees towards building self-reliance

title: Maintaining Access to Safe Environment in Rohingya Camps in Bangladesh
mainFocus: Restoring and managing degraded hill stream watersheds in Ukhiya Upazila for the benefits of people (refugees and host communities) and natural environment and biodiversity

title: Governance for Coastal Resilience Extension (G4CR-II) in Munshigonj Union, Shyamnagar Upazila of Satkhira District, Bangladesh
mainFocus: The project aims to promote grassroots resilience approaches in the development policies and processes of local government bodies in the area of water availability, food security, and resilient livelihoods

title: Ending the Cycle of Undernutrition in Bangladesh - SUCHANA (SCIBD), (WFC Part), (HKI Part)
mainFocus: To achieve a significant reduction in the incidence of stunting among young children in the districts of Sylhet and Moulvibazar in Sylhet Division. Delivery of a set of integrated nutrition-specific and nutrition-sensitive interventions in partnership with GoB, NGOs, and private sector actors to enhance food and nutrition security of very poor households

title: Haor Flood Management and Livelihood Improvement Project (HFMLIP)-LGED Part
mainFocus: In accordance with the development direction of the Haor Master Plan (April 2012), the project aims to achieve the development of the Haor area with an integrated approach through flood management infrastructure development, rural infrastructure development, and agriculture and fishery promotion activities

title: Management of the Sundarbans Mangrove Forests for Biodiversity Conservation and Increased Adaptation to Climate Change (SMP-II)
mainFocus: Capacity building of VCF and People’s forum for sustainable co-management of Sundarbans

title: Domestic Solid Waste Management Project- Bibiyana (DWMP-BY)
mainFocus: Management of solid wastes generated from the plants and drilling campaign (Major Capital Projects) in several locations of Chevron operation in Sylhet District during 2013-2021

title: Domestic Solid Waste Management Project- Jalalabad (DWMP-JB)
mainFocus: Management of solid wastes generated from the plants and drilling campaign (Major Capital Projects) in several locations of Chevron operation in Sylhet District during 2013-2019

title: Waste Management Services Letter of Contract (LoC) for use in Kanchan-1 Maheskhali
mainFocus: The management of hazardous and non-hazardous wastes that include the establishment of ETP, proper collection, transportation, segregation, and disposal in line with the applicable legal requirements that will be generated from the Kanchan-1 drilling programme in the land part of Block SS-04

title: Haor Advocacy Platform
clientDonorInfo: Previously funded by Oxfam Hong Kong, Now is going with CNRS own fund
mainFocus: Reduce community vulnerability through improvement of life and livelihoods of the poor and marginalized Haor communities in Bangladesh by improving governance situation of Haor areas by establishing a common and dynamic advocacy platform involving different actors/stakeholders; ensuring better support and services in the Haor area by influencing government, non-government, and private sector actors/stakeholders through greater collaboration, coordination, and community mobilization

title: CNRS Microfinance
mainFocus: To develop the socio-economic condition of poor communities through economic activities and microfinance; Develop the habit and tendency of saving; develop women leadership; involve the women into direct production by prioritizing them in the loan program
